description:
Dixie Comet has come to look at this great warehouse space for rent. Landlord Nate says that soon the plumbing will be working, but today there's no bathroom. Nate goes off to make a call, leaving Dixie alone. She wants to check out the space but she's completely distracted by the extreme discomfort of her very full bladder. She fidgets and crosses her legs and presses with her hands to try to hold it. Can she hold it? She becomes more and more distressed until... oh no! She starts to pee herself! She squeaks with alarm as the pee mark spreads through her crotch, darkening her blue-jeans and dripping to the floor. There's a puddle forming on the cement floor under her sneakers. Then her bladder completely betrays her and the fluid flows freely out of her pant leg! Everything's sopping wet!Â 
Now Dixie's in a panic. What's she going to do? Before she can figure that out, Nate comes back. He's shocked to see that she peed on his floor. She's utterly embarrassed. He wants her to clean it up, but there are no cleaning supplies. Dixie offers to mop it up with her pants. She begs him to turn away and not look while she peels off her wet pants. At first, he complies -- but then he unexpectedly turns back around and takes a cellphone photo of her with her peed pants halfway down to her ankles. SO HUMILIATING!
title: Desperation Pee!
